CustomField.formula: OwnerId = $User.Id || CONTAINS(litify_pm__Abbreviated_Users_1__c, MID($User.Id, 4, 2) + MID($User.Id, 11, 5)) || CONTAINS(litify_pm__Abbreviated_Users_2__c, MID($User.Id, 4, 2) + MID($User.Id, 11, 5)) || CONTAINS(litify_pm__Abbreviated_Users_3__c, MID($User.Id, 4, 2) + MID($User.Id, 11, 5))
CustomField.label: Assigned To Me
